name: handyfix
build: npm run build:web && npm run build:portal

scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,portal "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:portal"
scripts.build:web: npm run build:api-client && npm run build -w apps/handyfix-web
scripts.build:portal: npm run build:api-client && npm run build -w apps/handyfix-portal
